website_summaries.verdict: A versatile, long-range trap that works on some insects, but also has some functional and longevity issues.
pros: Can be used standing or in a hanging position
Attracts insects with a pleasant UV light, then sucks them into the unit with a fan that's fairly quiet to operate
Can be used indoors/outdoors, and has a 1,000 sq
cons: Some owners report disappointing results for mosquito control
May catch beneficial insects and small animals like lizards
Some malfunctions after several weeks of use noted

customer_reviews.title: 24 hours down.. not one mosquito flying around!
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love this thing! First morning in a long time I came outside and didn’t have to swat a single mosquito off! Disclaimer, I do have a stinger bug japper and the hoont running a the same time but it’s amazing. I attached a picture of all the mosquitos it killed. My throught was the other bugs would goto the zapper and the mosquitos would goto the hoont and I think I’m right. As long as this thing holds up I think I’m going to be a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: K. Turney

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this thing at first. But In the three years I've been at my current home this is the only summer I've enjoyed sitting on my deck at night! Everytime i empty this I notice tons of mosquitoes and other flying pests, it's also very quiet, if it weren't for the light you wouldn't know it was on! It makes a huge difference! I plan on buying one for my dad soon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: The machine works well out of the box. But do yourself a favor and buy some mosquitoe scent attractant packets and throw them in the basket, you’ll yield 3 - 4 times more mosquitoes. I don’t like about this machine is it kills moths. I wish it had another / optional screen to keep moths from getting in there. Also, this is a little louder than I would expect. Other than that this machine works well.
customer_reviews.author: DrewR

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I put it out on my back patio and it is just tearing the mosquitos up when we are not back there. I turn this thing on every night and after about a week I can go outside and not feel one mosquito bite. Awesome product
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: This thing works. I have observed mosquitoes, moths ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing works. I have observed mosquitoes, moths, flies, beetles and various other flying bugs in the trap. The uv light attracts the bugs and the fan pulls them into the trap reservoir. Usually the fan blade kills the bug but not always. The beetles have a hard time actually getting past the blade so I'll often find a mass grave around the outside of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: stray15

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately bought two of these. That was a mistake. This thing consists of a lamp, a fan, and a chamber for the insects. The insects are supposed to fly towards the light and then get sucked into the chamber by the fan. I set both of my units up. After a week of operation, the chamber contained tons of moth and some other insects, which I do not recognize, but not a single wasp, and not a single mosquito. There is no lack of either of these however, they just aren’t attracted by the light, or maybe the air flow is not strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: Sergey Solyanik

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My entryway turns into a mosquito haven during the summers and i get attacked from all angles on my way out to work. I purchased this to leave running overnight and it has totally worked. I’m catching hundreds. Opening it up to empty every few days provides me with a sense of horror and satisfaction that is typically reserved for halloween.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Kill the bugs with no effort and no mess.
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like. This is a great product. We have this plugged in on our patio and it works great. You can hear the fan a little bit, but it doesn't interfere with conversation or other sound like music or the TV. I seem to be catching more moths and beetles, but I'm sure the mosquitoes will come eventually. Well made. I tried going to the company website for my free 1-year warranty, but the site was down.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cheney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This trap works perfect and you hardly even know its there. Get one you'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nalusa_Falaya

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept but poor execution (literally!)
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what to say. It just doesn’t work. We hung this in our kids treehouse. Yes it did collect “some” bugs, but good gravy, it did not seem to do Anything to stop any of the mosquitoes. We didn’t expect a miracle but at least expected a difference. Nope. None. As many mosquito bites as happened before we got this happened after.
customer_reviews.author: B. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Works Really Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after buying the Mosquito Magnet $300 (within days) because I don't want to use sprays on or around my garden or chickens. Within less than a week this machine has worked better at killing mosquitoes HANDS DOWN!!! This machine alone has caught way more WITHOUT attractant. I should get the attractant today and I would wage a bet I will have to clean out the trap in 2 days!! Buying another TODAY!!!
customer_reviews.author: CrystalG

customer_reviews.title: Good for moths, not so much mosquitoes
customer_reviews.text: I can only give three stars for this item. While it does catch some moths and some flies, there have been no mosquitoes, gnats, or other biting bugs in the trap so far. I've tried it both inside and outside for one week at a time. Living in Florida there are mosquitoes and gnats everywhere. The directions state to clear an area of human activity for a few days...but that's not really practical in a 1/4 acre fenced yard.
customer_reviews.author: Brillias

customer_reviews.title: MOSQUITOES
customer_reviews.text: I'll say it was received "as advertised" and was easy to set-up. The problem was, in this West-Central Florida mosquito-laden area, it caught only small moths in 10 days- NOT a trace of a mosquito! After that, I separately purchased a 'mosquito lure' from my local Home Depot and placed it in the Hoont...so far, no evidence that mosquitos were lured. BE CAREFUL! Don't get yourself 'sucked-in'...because apparently mosquitoes are NOT! ALSO, despite their guarantee, the HOONT website IS NOT WORKING. There is NO phone number to call, so there is NO VALID CONTACT INFORMATION for HOONT, RECOMMENDATION: DON'T WASTE YOUR $ !
customer_reviews.author: Mildred J Steckel

customer_reviews.title: Pulls in moths but not mosquitoes
customer_reviews.text: I have a HUGE mosquito population and had high hopes for this device to control them so that I might enjoy my covered porch area. The mosquitoes DO swarm around it, but aren't sucked in. The concept is good, but the fan doesn't appear to be strong enough. Perhaps the Asian mosquitoes out during the day are stronger fliers than other mosquitoes. In any case, it does grab the moths, but unfortunately I still have as many mosquitoes as ever it seems.
customer_reviews.author: alice

customer_reviews.title: Pass this one by!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on this one. I have it hanging outside and the wind kept blowing off the catch screen so I have to tape it on. Very few bugs caught per week. The screen size is too large to contain any Gnats, just moths is all I get.
customer_reviews.author: Clancy

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work
customer_reviews.text: This did nothing for my mosquito problem. I plugged it in as soon as I got it and have left it on for 2 months. The idea was to stop the mosquitos before they started. Now that mosquito season is here, the problem still exists. Waist of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Great for moths - mosquitoes not so much
customer_reviews.text: We collect a lot of moths in this, but not mosquitoes. I have tried adding the two different types of lures that evidently appeal to different types of the little blood suckers, but few have taken the bait. Actually not quite sure why we are still using it, although it is kind of gratifying to dump out a whole bunch of moths now and then given the periodic damage they do to fabrics and dried goods in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Archie

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I like this product although it hasn't done a whole lot for our mosquito problems but at this point, after a few uses, I can't blame on the ineffectiveness of trap. Perhaps I will update at a later date. It's a good design and I like that I can hang it from my pergola or place on a table. Do note, as with many things it is pretty cheap plastic but at the price, I expected that.
customer_reviews.author: Shop Smart

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Worked one week. Piece of junk. Returned one product because only one fan worked; this one I just threw away.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Caro

customer_reviews.title: Does a reasonably good job in the area near the machine
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty good. This has made a pretty big dent in the mosquito population in our backyard. It hasn't totally eliminated them, but especially near the deck, where we keep this machine, there are significantly fewer mosquitoes. once you get more than 25 or 30 feet from the machine, the mosquito population seems much higher. Also, it catches many other types of bugs inducing moths and flying beetles. We have lots of fireflies in the area, but thankfully it does not seem to attract them.
customer_reviews.author: KateinMak

customer_reviews.title: Area of coverage
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this item a day ago ran it 24 hrs only had 2 bugs in it after 24 hrs of running. It only does a 1000 ft area. Made out of plastic and is small only stands about 24" with stand. Returning it as it did nit meet my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: bob L

customer_reviews.title: It is a pretty fan that sucks bugs in
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty fan that sucks bugs in. The box basically says, mosquitos will bite you before they go into this fan...
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well to alleviate mosquito pests.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a general flying insect attractant not specifically for mosquitoes like I thought. It did catch some but not enough to see a difference in my mosquito population. Even in the house where I set it bc mosquitoes were in my room, it was not enough. Also you have to wait for the bugs to die before emptying or they fly back out. The last thing I didn't like was that the base that holds the caught bugs, came off or fell off almost, too easily so it really was not easy to clean. I wouldn't recommend this as an effective mosquito catcher. Therefore I paid too much for the lack of effectiveness and ease of cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: JHa

customer_reviews.title: Basically I like this item since it does catch insects
customer_reviews.text: Basically I like this item since it does catch insects. The problems we are having is that the bottom (cage part) keeps falling off when we touch the unit and the on/off switch is hard to operate. We have also found that having cats in the backyard where this is reduces its effectiveness with mosquitos. Mosquitos like the cats best! :-(
customer_reviews.author: Gary D. Dales

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. It doesn’t work unless it’s within a few inches of your legs.
customer_reviews.text: This item works if you have it right next to you. If it’s not within a few inches of your legs it’s worthless. Unfortunately It does nothing for your upper body because it doesn’t work unless it’s within a few inches. The only reason I still have it is because I tried to give it a few days and within that time my husband threw the box out.
customer_reviews.author: chassity ruby

customer_reviews.title: Good looking - not so efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and technique. Doesn't really do what it says it does. It seems to have to be on for a while before it seems to work. I've used it every day since I got it and the trap has hardly anything in it while I can see a lot of mosquitoes flying around so I'm not complete sold on efficiency.
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you have grandkids who like to go out doors
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter love to go outdoors but we had a problem with mosquitoes. She is also inquisitive so buying an electric zapper was out. Lack of sound, meant lack of interest on her part. The mosquitoes were no longer a problem after 2 days so she got to go out and play without being bit.
customer_reviews.author: Edward E. Bunch

customer_reviews.title: Not very effective. Will work only when there is no other light around it
customer_reviews.text: The product quality is pretty nice, looks solid and durable. The problem is this whole fan system is not very effective, any other insects bigger than mosquitoes, like flies, bugs, butterflies, will bounce off the fan to the outside of the device and lay around your floor half dead
customer_reviews.author: Denis racovita

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly effective and easy to clean. It keeps some of the flying bugs away and allows us to sit outside more comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Miller

customer_reviews.title: After a week of using the hoot I am able to enjoy my backyard with my four nieces
customer_reviews.text: I live next to a guy who has a small swamp in his backyard that used to be for fish but now is only used for creating a mosquito pit. My backyard was unusable due to the fact of all the mosquitoes. After a week of using the hoot I am able to enjoy my backyard with my four nieces. It truly works and I am so happy with the product. Be thankful that you don't live next to people that breed mosquitoes!
customer_reviews.author: SHERRI F.

customer_reviews.title: and it makes it hard to enjoy the outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Compact design makes this non intrusive, but you can have it right near you while you're relaxing outside. We have a ton of mosquitos in our area, and it makes it hard to enjoy the outdoors. This makes a huge difference!! The little buggers are drawn to this rather that eating us alive.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Works but mostly on moths
customer_reviews.text: Its nice to not hear a constant zapping sound while sitting outside but I was a little disappointed that it didnt catch many mosquitos. We are in an area where there are so many mosquitos that we dont even want to sit outside so we assumed it would be full of mosquitos but it wasnt. We added a bit of fruit juice to the bottom to try to attract the mosquitos and I think that helped a little bit more but still not the results we were hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Groff

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: It's well made, but I purchased this to help get rid of mosquitoes and it seems to collect every type of flying bugs except mosquitoes... its been running for over a month in my very tiny backyard and once you step outside the mosquitoes are swarming. This works well on moths but they do not bother me...
customer_reviews.author: Brando

customer_reviews.title: Gnats are showing up now and if it can kill some gnats I would be happy. After 4 hours outside it hasn’t caught any ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not caught a single mosquito with this product. I live in Alaska and we have trillions of mosquitos, yet I haven’t caught any. Gnats are showing up now and if it can kill some gnats I would be happy. After 4 hours outside it hasn’t caught any gnats either. Maybe mine is defective. I wasted 50 bucks on nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Micah A. Heakin

customer_reviews.title: works very well
customer_reviews.text: the light is very low so it doesnt attract more bugs from far away. the fan is very quiet. kills a ton of bugs every night on our patio. frame is a bit flimsy
customer_reviews.author: jared richardson

customer_reviews.title: This product was perfect! It is small
customer_reviews.text: We needed something to control mosquitoes for an outdoor wedding in our backyard in Northern California. This product was perfect! It is small, quiet and worked well. We were not bothered by bugs at all in the area surrounding the mosquito killer. I would recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Dina A. Bosby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I plan to buy another next year for another area. I highly recommend this for both indoor and outdoor. I will say it works less week during bright day. That cannot be blamed on this though
customer_reviews.author: Michael Commet

customer_reviews.title: Empty once a week
customer_reviews.text: Amazed at how many bugs this thing collects. Works better than the more expensive brand leader. I bought the more expensive brand. It would clog up causing the blade to stop. The fan blade on brand X broke the first year The blade on this one does not get stopped by accumulation of bug guts. Much better quality than brand X.
customer_reviews.author: Bob A.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my HOONT purchase. This product when left on all of the time does attract mosquitos and kills them dead. With recent "ankle biters" in the northern OC area, I'm happy I have my HOONT to cut down on the horrific buzzards.
customer_reviews.author: Megan E. Stoner

customer_reviews.title: I haven't figured out how to open the cup yet ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't figured out how to open the cup yet, so I don't know if it's killing mosquitos, but this withstood some heavy rain, a dozen chickens and a dozen nosy ducks. I'll update after I get the cup open.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Grey

customer_reviews.title: Can’t tell any difference
customer_reviews.text: Using this to fight mosquitos in northern Idaho, it barely works. It does not prevent mosquitos from finding/biting you, even when you are standing 25 ft away. It also catches all kinds of insects, including many many moths. Maybe half of everything caught are mosquitos.
customer_reviews.author: Shall-shall

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. It has a great style
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It has a great style. I think it would be nice to have something sticky in it but that is something I can add myself. Update: It attracts bugs yes but they get in the screened in area and them come back out.
customer_reviews.author: mistydawn74

customer_reviews.title: Works fine in small areas
customer_reviews.text: Have a mosquito problem (inside and outside). Used inside areas and found insect remains in bottom of trap next morning. Used in different areas of house until reasonably satisfied. Outside is a different story. Too many bugs and too large of an area for unit purchased. I feel reasonably satisfied with the small unit and purchased a larger (11/2 acre) unit today.
customer_reviews.author: Gamama

customer_reviews.title: Kills mosquitoes and moths effectively
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use at our cabin in the woods. The mosquitoes were really a nuisance. I can't say that this completely took care of the problem. I believe it helped cut down the numbers. Each one neutralized prevented their next generation.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Got a very decent amount of bugs but no mosquitos. Didn't cover a very wide range. Only a few feet, if that.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Diamond

customer_reviews.title: You should try this!
customer_reviews.text: This really works! I see a lot of dead bugs inside and easy to clean up. I had already one of this and because it's doing what it's supposed to do I have decided to buy another one for the front porch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty effective. My pictures were from after two nights on the porch. 80-90% of the trapped insects were mosquitos. I wish the light was brighter though, it's rather dim.
customer_reviews.author: RenRap

customer_reviews.title: No thanks
customer_reviews.text: Has never caught 1 bug for me. As I was being bitten up last night, I looked over and watched the bugs circle and fly away from this device. Frustrating. Also its flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Safe and easy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this looking for a safe way to enjoy the outdoors with our newborn. This does the job perfectly so we can enjoy the fresh air with out getting bit or covered in stinky bug spray!
customer_reviews.author: rachael

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I got this product because I was fed up with mosquitos in my front yard. It was a lot bigger than I expected for some reason, but that wasn't a problem. It can hang, or has a stand which is nice. The only thing I failed to realize is that this plugs in, and I don't have an outlet anywhere on the front of my house so I have to use an extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Svedberg

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t work at all. It’s been plugged in every night for almost 2 months. It doesn’t catch biting insects and I have not had to clean the basket because there’s nothing really in it. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for the patio
customer_reviews.text: You won't believe how many bugs you will catch, actually pretty nasty. A lot of the bugs survive but it keeps the patio clear and it is really nice on summer nights.
customer_reviews.author: nick lenta

customer_reviews.title: Does not work at all.
customer_reviews.text: My husband used this mosquito killer for many hours (following all instructions) while doing a backyard project. The mosquitoes feasted on him, and the trap did not collect one single mosquito. Very disappointed in this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JLBos

customer_reviews.title: Works great in my back yard
customer_reviews.text: This is the first year in decades that I have been bitten so badly my mosquitoes and fly's. This is making my gardening very enjoyable and bite free.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for our flies.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it hoping for it to catch flies. In 10 days is hasn't caught any. May work well for gnats and mosquitos, but we don't have them around here.
customer_reviews.author: MelReyn

customer_reviews.title: Impressive for the price
customer_reviews.text: We are using it hanging by a shepard's hook. It seems to be catching quite a few mosquitos. Easy to use and clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Schwantes

customer_reviews.title: Basket broke first clean out, but it is effective.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, just don’t drop the basket from waist height. Mine broke the first time. That said, the unit is effective.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!!
customer_reviews.text: Hated it!!! Bottom kept falling off, fan kept falling out. No way to remove bugs when full without them flying out at you. Tried several times to log on website and I was unable to!!! Waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: we ed dddffxx

customer_reviews.title: For the price I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I live in South TX and always have issues with mosquitos. Was thinking of ordering a mosquito magnet, but decided to try this thing out. After the first night there were a decent amount of mosquitos and other flying insects in it. For the price I'm happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Firestone Trading Co

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t kill
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it for mosquitos and flies which I hate with a vengeance. I haven’t had much luck with either of the two but it has killed all of the moths beetles and gnats.
customer_reviews.author: shakeylla

customer_reviews.title: I kill more mosquitos with my hand
customer_reviews.text: I kill more mosquitos with my hand than this machine for the week was on. I return it.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Luque

customer_reviews.title: It works ok. Doesn’t kill the bugs unless they ...
customer_reviews.text: It works ok. Doesn’t kill the bugs unless they hit the spinning plastic fan blade. Hard to open to clean and when you do open it the bugs fly out.
customer_reviews.author: Golferelite

customer_reviews.title: This works great!
customer_reviews.text: I set it up, run it 24x7 and it catches many mosquitoes & other bugs daily. No zapping sounds either. Wish I had gotten this a LONG time ago!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Lapke

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt catch mosquitos
customer_reviews.text: If you have a moth problem, this is the product for you. Very few mosquito's were caught. It filled up the bin with moths after about 2 weeks. I tried moving it to a couple different locations and still did not work well for mosquito's. It does work better for catching moths if it is closer to the ground so beware if hanging it from a porch or deck.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Put it outdoors one night and caught some bugs already ...
customer_reviews.text: Put it outdoors one night and caught some bugs already. Hope it is water proof the rain will not damage it.
customer_reviews.author: henri

customer_reviews.title: Attractes bugs, but none actually go in. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Attractes bugs, but none actually go in. I have way way more bugs then I did without it. They literally habg out around and on it. Should have gone with a actually bug zapper
customer_reviews.author: daniel fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have bugs in the tray but they aren’t attracted to it. They will be sucked in if they fly REALLY close to the fan. Not impressed at all.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Not one bit effective
customer_reviews.text: Would give this zero stars if possible... Left outside and on for 24 a day for over a week--it only trapped one mosquito and maybe three moths...
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ng

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: works fine at killing mosquitos but the legs are quite flimsy. metal would have been better.
customer_reviews.author: LN Roessig

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt seem to work that good
customer_reviews.text: Havent noticed it working very well, probably works better if hanging but as table top not great.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bellofatto

customer_reviews.title: Look and work great
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these because I love the way they look and work. Great quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Cline

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work on mosquitoes
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of Mosquitos but I didn’t find any in the trap. Lots of Moths and June Bugs.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: Not sure since there aren't many bugs here with it still eing cold at times. Will update with more accurate info later on.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Hubby will come outside with me now!
customer_reviews.text: He wouldn't come out with me before because he would always get beaten up by all mosquitoes.
customer_reviews.author: Lunar

customer_reviews.title: dependable
customer_reviews.text: received it and I love it. it can sit on a table or hang. I live in Southern Georgia so it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: stacia

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: have had this unit since May and have not caught/killer one single insect.
customer_reviews.author: Shari E. Jones

customer_reviews.title: I have 1/3 rd of an acre and one of ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 1/3 rd of an acre and one of these on the west side and one on the east has done the job.
customer_reviews.author: John T. Danielson

customer_reviews.title: I returned back
customer_reviews.text: Actually I return back because the switch off/on was not working plus I was not sure of the efficient of this one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall I am satisfied with this product and I feel that there are ...
customer_reviews.text: I placed this on my lawn and it had been running for about a month. I also placed an Octenol mosquito attractant in the bug collection chamber to help attract mosquitoes. It caught a lot of mosquitoes, but also a lot of moths. Overall I am satisfied with this product and I feel that there are less mosquitoes biting at night while I am sitting on my patio.
customer_reviews.author: Edward T Palange III

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it...doesn’t work as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Reviewed this about a week after receiving it...live at a lake house, lots of mosquitoes, have keep this plugged in over nite, checked it in the AM couldn’t find any mosquitoes, but a lot of moths and ants!!! Again no mosquitoes!! So at this point, I know I can’t use a four letter word to review it, so let me be nice and say junk!! Amazon, you need to stop selling this, it’s useless for mosquitoes as advertised! Also spelled list site to go to to activate warranty, doesn’t exist!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Kill Mosquitos
customer_reviews.text: Updating review from 2 starts to 5 because of great customer service. Reached out to company with our experience and they immediately provided a refund. We were disappointed in this bug trap/killer because it does not attract/kill mosquitoes as advertised. When we open the trap, we mostly see moths.
customer_reviews.author: Rob M

customer_reviews.title: Captures all sorts of insects
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product based on previous reviews. It captures all sorts of insects, just hasn’t caught the mosquitoes that we mainly purchased it for. We did find a lizard in the fan, which made the unit stop working. My husband then turned off and unplugged the unit, so it could cool down. He then turned it back on, and it’s still working great. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri LeBourgeois

customer_reviews.title: Well it’s quiet and has a nice blue light but that’s about it
customer_reviews.text: It only catches moths, none of the biting bugs or annoying flies
customer_reviews.author: WickedAB

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Not the best but gets the job done with Gnats just not Mosquitos
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: My parents live in a very wooded area in buggy ...
customer_reviews.text: My parents live in a very wooded area in buggy Alabama. Really distracts the evening airborn varmits from a human snack:)
customer_reviews.author: J Polhemus

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: van is not quit for indoor use, collect some mosquitoes after 3 weeks of use
customer_reviews.author: mamoun

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't hurt a fly....
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a week and has not killed ANY bugs... Meanwhile I have a dozen mosquito bites on my legs. Very disappointed, looking into returning.
customer_reviews.author: MY

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a little lightweight. Also, rather clumsy to get into for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene J.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It traps Moths but does not do much for the mosquitos or gnats around my deck.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Get a bug attractant with your machine!
customer_reviews.text: It's catching bugs. Just not flies. I bought mosquito and fly attractant and the flies are still not attracted to it. But I guess it's still catching something and that's all I care about.
customer_reviews.author: taylor goertler

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Works and operates as described. provides a nice light easy to clean ++
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Price

customer_reviews.title: it has proven to be GREAT.
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about this product, it has proven to be GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: JDHelle

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working. The fan doesn’t work. Must return. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertsed.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Units works as advertised. Quiet so it does not disturb the area. It was purchased for use with our RV, When we set it up it does greatly reduce the number of flying bugs in the area. Easy to clean by removing the catch tray. We will update again after the summer is over and we have had more time to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It works for screened porch and inside home at night when kids leave doors open and bugs get in. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: WKS

customer_reviews.title: No more bug bites!
customer_reviews.text: This product rules. It gobbles mosquitos and doesn't trap the good bugs(bees, butterflies, etc. A great price too compared to other brands! Easy to set up and I just let it run 24/7. Best to hang it high on a shepherd pole about 5ft. I recommend this product highly
customer_reviews.author: StephenS

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work well.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but no success. After a couple a days, being on constantly, it trapped 1 mosquito which flew away when I opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B.

customer_reviews.title: Interesting approach to insect control.
customer_reviews.text: Interesting approach to insect control. Seems to work well except the bottom basket doesn’t stay attached we’ll snd keeps falling off
customer_reviews.author: DTWight

customer_reviews.title: Effective and convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This product works great so far! We have it on our deck, and it is now possible to eat dinner outside without being attacked by bugs. I also like the option of being able to put it on the stand, or hang it on a hook, depending on where we want to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric DuBois

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money 😢
customer_reviews.text: I had it plugged in and turned on in my garage for more then 48 hours and only trapped 3 nats no mosquitoes ! I got chewed up whitin minutes of entry. Going to look for a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk G.

product_meta.title: Hoont Mosquito Killer and Gnat Fly Trap Killer by, Indoor Outdoor Mosquito Trap Control with Stand - Bright UV Light and Fan/Exterminate Mosquitoes, Wasps, Etc. - Perfect for Patio, Gardens, etc.
product_meta.description:
The Hoont Mosquito killer and Gnat Fly Trap is extremely safe and hygiene. No high-voltage electric and no zapping sounds; eliminates flies quietly and safely. Safe to use 24/7 and may be used at areas with kids and pets. Features and optional stand to enlarge its’ effective area by keeping it elevated. Made with quality components; will last for many years to come! 

Features a bright UV bulb which flies find irresistible, and get attracted to the fly trap; the fan then sucks the flies inside and prevents them from escaping. The Hoont Mosquito Killer and Fly Trap Killer powerfully attracts and traps mosquitoes, flies, gnats, flies, wasps, beetles and much more. 

Perfect for indoors or outdoors. Can be used at home, office, kitchens, restaurants, schools, etc. For residential, commercial and industrial use. Perfect also for gardens, yards, pool area, etc. Effective for areas of up to 1000 sq. feet! 

Get rid of all flying insects and bugs without the use of pesticides or dangerous chemicals. Maintenance free and easy to use mosquito killer and Fly Killer; simply plug in the fly trap and watch your area become free of all pesky and annoying flies.
feature_bullets: EFFECTIVE & POWERFUL – The Hoont Mosquito Killer Trap features a bright UV bulb which flies find irresistible, and get attracted to the fly trap; the fan then sucks the flies inside and prevents them from escaping. The Hoont Mosquito Killer and Fly Trap Killer powerfully attracts and traps mosquitoes, flies, gnats, flies, wasps, beetles and much more.

NO CHEMICALS, NO PESTICIDES & ODOR FREE – Get rid of all flying insects and bugs without the use of pesticides or dangerous chemicals. Maintenance free and easy to use mosquito killer and Fly Killer; simply plug in the fly trap and watch your area become free of all pesky and annoying flies.

QUIET OPERATION & SAFE – The Hoont Mosquito killer and Gnat Fly Trap is extremely safe and hygiene. No high-voltage electric and no zapping sounds; eliminates flies quietly and safely. Safe to use 24/7 and may be used at areas with kids and pets. Features and optional stand to enlarge its’ effective area by keeping it elevated. Made with quality components; will last for many years to come!

WEATHERPROOF & WATERPROOF - Perfect for indoors or outdoors. Can be used at home, office, kitchens, restaurants, schools, etc. For residential, commercial and industrial use. Perfect also for gardens, yards, pool area, etc. Effective for areas of up to 1000 sq. feet!

EASY TO CLEAN - The Hoont Mosquito Killer and Fly Trap is simple to clean; dead flies get trapped in a neat hidden tray located at the bottom of the device. To clean, simply remove the tray and wash with warm water; let it air-dry and it’s ready for its next fly catching session. Simple, effective and clean! / Size: 19” x 11” / Wire length: 5 Ft. / Low energy consumption. / Bulb: Bright UV Bulb (Replaceable)
